tool.name: qiime2 composition da-barplot

param.name: data
param.label: data: FeatureData[DifferentialAbundance]
param.help: [required] The ANCOM-BC output to be plotted.

param.name: error_label
param.label: error_label: Str
param.help: [default: 'se'] Label for effect size errors in `data`.

param.name: significance_label
param.label: significance_label: Str
param.help: [default: 'q_val'] Label for statistical significance level in `data`.

param.name: significance_threshold
param.label: significance_threshold: Float % Range(0.0, 1.0, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 1.0] Exclude features with statistical significance level greater (i.e., less significant) than this threshold.

param.name: effect_size_threshold
param.label: effect_size_threshold: Float % Range(0.0, None)
param.help: [default: 0.0] Exclude features with an absolute value of effect size less than this threshold.

repeat.name: feature_ids
repeat.help: [optional] Exclude features if their ids are not included in this index.
repeat.title: feature_ids: Metadata

param.name: __q2galaxy__GUI__select__
param.label: level_delimiter: Str
param.help: [optional] If feature ids encode hierarchical information, split the levels when generating feature labels in the visualization using this delimiter.

param.name: label_limit
param.label: label_limit: Int
param.help: [optional] Set the maximum length that will be viewable for axis labels. You can set this parameter if your axis labels are being cut off.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: composition da-barplot =============================== Differential abundance bar plots
Outputs: -------- :visualization.qzv: <no description>
|
Description: ------------ Generate bar plot views of ANCOM-BC output. One plot will be present per column in the ANCOM-BC output. The `significance_threshold`, `effect_size_threshold` and `feature_ids` filter results are intersected, such that only features that remain after all three filters have been applied will be present in the output.
|
